short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We noticed that new Gmail is loading like a snail. Let's watch the crawling snail while it is loading! It's funny, raise your mood!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nobody likes slow loading of web-pages. I developed this small extension for my friends and for all who would like to entertain a bit while Gmail is loading.

Who will be first this time: snail or Gmail progress bar?

:)
